sqlMap.insert: insert into t_character_dgwd (f_characterid, f_nowwd, f_luck, f_faildcount, f_luck_lastclear, f_before_luck) values (#characterid:INTEGER#, #nowwd:INTEGER#, #luck:INTEGER#, #faildcount:INTEGER#, #luckLastclear:TIMESTAMP#, #beforeLuck:INTEGER#)
sqlMap.update: update t_character_dgwd set f_nowwd = #nowwd:INTEGER#, f_luck = #luck:INTEGER#, f_faildcount = #faildcount:INTEGER#, f_luck_lastclear = #luckLastclear:TIMESTAMP#, f_before_luck = #beforeLuck:INTEGER# where f_characterid = #characterid:INTEGER#

update t_character_dgwd
f_nowwd = #nowwd:INTEGER#
f_luck = #luck:INTEGER#
f_faildcount = #faildcount:INTEGER#
f_luck_lastclear = #luckLastclear:TIMESTAMP#

where f_characterid = #characterid:INTEGER#
